description: This file defines a React functional component named NotesList that displays a list of notes, rendering each note using the NoteCard component. It handles empty states and maps over the notes array to generate the UI.

methods.name: NotesList({ notes, onEdit, onDelete })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a grid of note cards or a placeholder message when no notes are available.

ctags.name: NotesList
ctags.pattern: /^export default function NotesList({ notes, onEdit, onDelete }) {$/
